bandaranayakamaha wihara wanshika syamopali maha nikaye mahanuwara malwathu maha wihara parshawaye athi pujya sahithya chakrawarthi aacharya niyangoda dhammakirthi shri sangharakkhitha wijithasiri anu nahimipanan wahanse wisin ugath dharmadhara, winayadhara, supeshala shikshakami bahushratha padiruwanak washayen shri sambuddha shasanayatath samastha bauddha lokayatath itukarana athi udara dharmashasthriya shasanika ha bauddha sanskruthika sewawan agaya karamin anunahimipanan ta dakwanu labana gaurawayak washayen buruma rajaya wisin “maha saddhamma jothikadhaja” yana gaurawa nama sammuthiya pirinama atha.shri lanka bauddha ha pali wishwawidyalaya magin sahithya chakrawarthi yana sammana upadhiyen pidum labu wijithasiri anunahimiyo meyata wasara kihipayakata ihatha di widyalankara sabhawa magin pirinamana lada sthawira wanshalankara shasana kirthi shri yana gaurawopadhiyen da sammana labuha.
